briefTitle: Study of the Influence of Ductal Carcinoma in Situ on the Outcome of Invasive Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Longitudinal Observational Study About the Influence of Ductal Carcinoma in Situ on the Outcome of Invasive Breast Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients with invasive ductal carcinoma of the breast
* Patients who received surgery for primary invasive breast cancer between 2010 and 2015

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients with metastasis at the diagnostic
